title: Sidemen Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Discover Sidemen, a tranquil village in East Bali known for its rice terraces and traditional weaving.

stops.description: Arrive and tour the rice fields, visit a weaving workshop.

title: Sidemen Village & East Bali Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Sidemen Village and East Bali's highlights.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, rice fields, and weaving workshop.
Visit nearby temples or local markets.
